Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Mostagedda, 2840 Found with a child.
Curator's comments: Also from this burial: bagle with knobs (1929,1015.62). Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), pl. XXII, 25 (where 18 shells are illustrated); Grave register, pl. VII.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (72)
